projects.title: Student Marks Predictor
projects.description: A Python-based model that predicts student grades based on study hours using simple linear regression. Includes data cleaning and handling using Pandas, and model training/testing with Scikit-learn.

projects.title: Exploratory Data Analysis on Retail CSV Data
projects.description: Performed EDA on a retail sales dataset to uncover patterns, distributions, and inconsistencies. Cleaned missing values, normalized data types, and generated statistical summaries (mean, median).
